item.title: Nippon Ichi Software projects Curse, Gobble delayed to 2026 in Japan
item.content:encoded:
• PS4
  • PS5
  • Switch

No longer due out in 2025.

Nippon Ichi Software has delayed dark dungeon RPG code-name Curse and side-scrolling action game code-name Gobble from their previously planned 2025 release windows to 2026 in Japan.

According to Nippon Ichi Software, a little more time is necessary to deliver an even better gameplay experience.

Curse will be available for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, and Switch, and Gobble will be available for PlayStation 5 and Switch. If you missed our previous coverage, read more about each game here.



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/09/nippon-ichi-software-projects-curse-gobble-delayed-to-2026-in-japan

item.title: Daisenryaku SSB2 announced for PS5, Switch 2, Switch, and PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Switch 2

Due out on February 26, 2026 in Japan.

SystemSoft Beta has announced modern warfare simulation game Daisenryaku SSB2 for PlayStation 5, Switch 2, Switch, and PC (Steam). It will launch on February 26, 2026 in Japan for 7,980 yen (8,778 yen with tax).

Get the first details below.

Daisenryaku SSB2” is a simulation game where players command units such as tanks and fighter planes to capture enemy territory. Form your own strategy to achieve victory against enemy forces across various battlefields.

The game features over 300 weapons, focusing on those currently in operation, ranging from fighter planes and tanks to assault landing ships and anti-submarine patrol planes. There are 50 completely new stages to choose from. New elements such as “Industrial Power,” “Arms Modification,” and “Radar Bases” add further depth to the gameplay.

The key to victory lies in your strategy. This is a game that truly tests your “grand strategy.”

watch the announcement trailer below. Visit the official website here.

Announce Trailer



https://www.gematsu.com/2025/09/daisenryaku-ssb2-announced-for-ps5-switch-2-switch-and-pc
